member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The validator to validate record parameters.

member.summary: Creates a new record in the file system.

member.summary: Edits an existing record in the file system.
member.param: The ID of the record to edit.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetFilesystemService.GetRecords
member.summary: Gets all records from the file system.
member.returns: A read-only collection of file cabinet records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetFilesystemService.GetStat
member.summary: Gets the total number of records in the file system.
member.returns: The number of records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetFilesystemService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds records by first name.
member.param: The first name to search for.
member.returns: A read-only collection of matching records.

member.summary: Finds records by last name.
member.param: The last name to search for.
member.returns: A read-only collection of matching records.

member.summary: Finds records by date of birth.
member.param: The date of birth to search for.
member.returns: A read-only collection of matching records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetFilesystemService.MakeSnapshot
member.summary: Creates a snapshot of the current state of the records in the file system.
member.returns: A snapshot of the current state of the records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetFilesystemService.RemoveRecord(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes the record with the specified ID by marking it as deleted.
member.param: The ID of the record to remove.
member.exception: Thrown when the record with the specified ID doesn't exist.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetFilesystemService.Purge
member.summary: Defragments the data file by removing deleted records.
member.returns: The number of purged records.
